goals.description: Implement @mongodb and @redis operators for NoSQL database operations
goals.success_criteria: MongoDB and Redis databases can be connected, queried, and managed via bash

goals.description: Implement @postgresql operator for PostgreSQL database operations
goals.success_criteria: PostgreSQL database can be connected, queried, and managed with SQL operations

goals.description: Implement @mysql operator for MySQL database operations
goals.success_criteria: MySQL database can be connected, queried, and managed with SQL operations
